definition: in medicine, the extraction by centesis of amniotic fluid from a pregnant woman - generally after the 15th week of pregnancy - to aid in the diagnosis of fetal abnormalities
details:
noun
- in medicine, the extraction by centesis of amniotic fluid from a pregnant woman - generally after the 15th week of pregnancy - to aid in the diagnosis of fetal abnormalities
= example: in medicine, the extraction by centesis of amniotic fluid from a pregnant woman - generally after the 15th week of pregnancy - to aid in the diagnosis of fetal abnormalities
= synonyms: amniocentesis
